sentences.en: A virus detector was an electrical device that turned blue if a ZAP was nearby.
sentences.cn: 病毒探测器是一种电子装置,当zap病毒 临近时,它会变成蓝色.

sentences.en: Bang! Crash! This ZAP certainly was clumsy.
sentences.cn: 砰! 咔嚓! 这个ZAP病毒一定很笨重.

sentences.en: But until they can locate and destroy the ZAP.
sentences.cn: 但是在找到zap病毒 并摧毁它们之前.

sentences.en: Doctors have tried zapping tumors with high-voltage radiation.
sentences.cn: 医生试过用高压辐射消除肿瘤。

sentences.en: He have to zap the invading spaceships to get points.
sentences.cn: 他必须干掉入侵的太空船才能得分.

sentences.en: I really admire her she's so full of zap!
sentences.cn: 我真佩服她--精力那麽充沛!

sentences.en: I really adore him . He's so full of zap.
sentences.cn: 我真佩服他, 精力那麽充沛!

sentences.en: Is it a ZAP? I asked.
The laser weapons are designed to zap enemy missiles.
sentences.cn: 这些激光武器是用来摧毁敌军导弹的。

sentences.en: The tyrosine phosphorylated ZAP - 70 in the CD 3~ + T cells induced by M � � CD was detected by immunoblotting.
sentences.cn: 免疫印迹法检测MβCD诱导的CD3+T细胞中ZAP-70的磷酸化.

sentences.en: The tyrosine phosphorylation of ZAP - 70 in CD 3~ + T cells was enhanced by M � � CD.
sentences.cn: MβCD能够促进CD3+T细胞中ZAP-70分子的酪氨酸磷酸化.

sentences.en: The very TV spots people were trying to zap on TV, we began to stream online.
sentences.cn: 最电视地点人正在尝试在电视上快速的动, 我们开始在线流出.

sentences.en: What would happen to me if a ZAP got me while I was in the computer?
When he is underneath the energy trap, charge up the orb to zap him!
sentences.cn: 当他到力量陷阱的下方,给石球充电, 给他致命一击!

sentences.en: You have to zap the invading spaceships to get points.
sentences.cn: (玩电动玩具等)你必须干掉入侵的太空船才能得分.

sentences.en: ZAP was a very rapid virus with long searching tentacles.
sentences.cn: zap能 用它那细长的搜索触角迅速地扩散所携带的病毒.

trans.tran_en: to quickly attack or destroy something, especially using a beam of electricity
